description: Detective investigations lets you investigate IAM users and IAM roles using indicators of compromise. An indicator of compromise (IOC) is an artifact observed in or on a network, system, or environment that can (with a high level of confidence) identify malicious activity or a security incident. GetInvestigation returns the investigation results of an investigation for a behavior graph.

parameters.name: GraphArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the behavior graph.

parameters.name: InvestigationId
parameters.description: The investigation ID of the investigation report.

nested_items.name: GraphArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the behavior graph.

nested_items.name: InvestigationId
nested_items.description: The investigation ID of the investigation report.

nested_items.name: EntityArn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN). Detective supports IAM user ARNs and IAM role ARNs.

nested_items.name: EntityType
nested_items.description: Type of entity. For example, Amazon Web Services accounts, such as an IAM user and/or IAM role.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the investigation report in UTC time stamp format.

nested_items.name: ScopeStartTime
nested_items.description: The start date and time used to set the scope time within which you want to generate the investigation report. The value is an UTC ISO8601 formatted string. For example, 2021-08-18T16:35:56.284Z.

nested_items.name: ScopeEndTime
nested_items.description: The data and time when the investigation began. The value is an UTC ISO8601 formatted string. For example, 2021-08-18T16:35:56.284Z.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status based on the completion status of the investigation.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: The severity assigned is based on the likelihood and impact of the indicators of compromise discovered in the investigation.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the investigation. An archived investigation indicates that you have completed reviewing the investigation.
